Package esc.baylor.edu.groupProject.Objects

Class TransactionLog

java.lang.Object
esc.baylor.edu.groupProject.Objects.TransactionLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TransactionLog
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The TransactionLog object stores the data for all Transactions and Categories
Author:
Trae, Timmy
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TransactionLog()
    Initializes the transaction log and calls for the program to load stored data

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionLog

      public TransactionLog()
      Initializes the transaction log and calls for the program to load stored data

  • Method Details

    • getTransactionList

      public java.util.Collection<Transaction> getTransactionList()
      Gets the collection of Transactions in the TransactionLog
      Returns:
      Returns a clone of the collection of transactions associated with this TransactionLog object

    • setCurrentSavings

      public void setCurrentSavings​(double amount, java.util.Date date)
      Sets the current savings and associated date in the TransactionLog
      Parameters:
      amount - New value of user savings
      date - The date at which the user had those savings

    • getCurrentBalance

      public java.lang.Double getCurrentBalance()
      Calculates the users current balance
      Returns:
      A double representation of the users current balance calculated by summing transactions after the date set by the balance and subtracting the current balance

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction​(Types type, java.lang.String title, java.util.Date date, java.lang.Double amount, java.lang.Integer recur)
      Creates and new transaction and adds it to the Transaction Log given the Transactions information. Checks for recurring dates and adds them to the transaction list as well if necessary
      Parameters:
      type - The enumerated type of the transaction, either Income or Expense
      title - The name of the transaction
      date - The date on which the transaction occurred
      amount - The amount of the transaction
      recur - How often this transaction recurs. Null if it is not recurring

    • getTransaction

      public Transaction getTransaction​(int index)
      Returns a transaction given its sorted index
      Parameters:
      index - The index of a transaction in the sorted list
      Returns:
      The Transaction at the given index in the sorted list

    • editTransaction

      public void editTransaction​(int index, Types type, java.lang.String title, java.util.Date date, java.lang.Double amount, java.lang.Integer recur)
      Replaces the data of the transaction at the given index with the newly provided data. If the transaction is recurring it will check for recursive dates and add those to the transaction list as well
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the transaction in the Transaction Sort list
      type - The type of the transaction
      title - The title of the transaction
      date - The date of the transaction
      amount - The amount of the transaction
      recur - The recurrence of the Transaction in days

    • removeTransaction

      public void removeTransaction​(Transaction t)
      Removes a transaction from the transaction list
      Parameters:
      t - The transaction to be removed from the transaction list

    • addCategory

      public void addCategory​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String notes)
      Adds a category to the category list
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category
      notes - Notes for the category

    • editCategory

      public void editCategory​(int index, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String notes)
      Edits the category at the given index in the category list
      Parameters:
      index - The index in the category list of the category being edited
      name - The new name of the Category
      notes - The new set of notes for the Category

    • removeCategory

      public void removeCategory​(Category cat)
      Removes a category from the category list
      Parameters:
      cat - The category to remove from the list

    • getCategory

      public Category getCategory​(int index)
      Gets a Category from the TransactionLog
      Parameters:
      index - The index of a Category
      Returns:
      the category at the given index in the category list

    • size

      public int size()
      Gets the size of the TransactionLog
      Returns:
      The number of Transactions in the TransactionLog

    • isInCategory

      public boolean isInCategory​(int index, Category cat)
      Determines if a Transaction is in a Category
      Parameters:
      index - The index of a Transaction in the list of Transactions
      cat - A Category from the Transaction Log
      Returns:
      True if the Transaction is in the given Category; false otherwise

    • categoryExists

      public boolean categoryExists​(java.lang.String name)
      Checks if a Category exists
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category to check for.
      Returns:
      True if a Category with the given name exists; false if not

    • categoryCount

      public int categoryCount()
      Counts the number of Categories for the TransactionLog
      Returns:
      The number of categories associated with the transaction log

    • save

      public void save()
      saves the users transactions when one is added or removed
